hero.description1: I am a passionate Frontend developer who creates beautiful and functional web experiences. With a love for technology and design, I always find ways to combine aesthetics and performance to deliver high-quality products.
hero.description2: I specialize in React, Next.js, TypeScript and modern frontend technologies. I always learn and update the latest trends in the industry to create the best solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.whoAmI: I'm a passionate frontend developer specializing in creating responsive, interactive, and clean user interfaces. With a strong background in Informatics Engineering, I combine design sensibility with technical expertise to build exceptional digital experiences.
about.goals: My goal is to continuously enhance my skills and contribute to innovative projects that positively impact users' lives. I am committed to staying current with the latest technologies and best practices in web development.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some of my recent projects that showcase my skills and passion for development.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: I'm always interested in new opportunities and exciting projects. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out!
contact.successMessage: Thank you for your message! I'll get back to you soon.
contact.errorMessage: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again later.

webDevelopment.title: Web Development
webDevelopment.description: Creating responsive, modern websites and web applications with cutting-edge technologies and best practices.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Solutions
ecommerce.description: Building comprehensive online stores with secure payment integration and user-friendly shopping experiences.

mobileDevelopment.title: Mobile Development
mobileDevelopment.description: Developing native and cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android devices.

apiDevelopment.title: API Development
apiDevelopment.description: Designing and implementing robust RESTful APIs and microservices for scalable applications.

footer.description: Passionate Frontend Developer creating beautiful and functional web experiences with modern technologies.
